overview:
Michael was born and raised in the southern parts of Sweden, Ã…hus and is currently living in Stockholm, Sweden.

Michael has some 15 years within the publishing and media industry with a focus on management, business development, change management, turn arounds, marketing and sales.

He has held a number of positions as CEO and Director of small and medium sized companies during the last ten years and brings a strong passion for identifying and growing new products and business ventures.

Main focus is currently on PunktB, a venture management company focusing on early stage funding and growth of new companies, mainly within IT, media, mobile and entertainment. Current portfolio consists of some 10 different investments in various phases.

Specialties Strategy, Business Development, Direct Sales, Marketing, Change Management, Turn arounds, Entrepreneurship
